openingAccountStepsText: To create an Agricultural Bank account, you need the following items
IdentificationSub: Access to the camera to record
personalInfoPageTitleText: Select your account type and enter your information.
notEmptymobileText: The mobile number cannot be empty.
notEmptynationalCodeSerialText: National card series cannot be empty.
notEmptynationalCodeText: The national code cannot be empty.
notEmptybirthDateText: Date of birth cannot be empty.
notEmptyidentityIssueDateText: The issue date cannot be empty.
otpPageTitleText: The activation code has been sent to your number. Please enter it in the box below after receiving it.
otpSendAgainSuccess: The activation code has been sent again.
obligationTitle: Letter of commitment to open an account at the Bank of Agriculture
acceptObligation: I have read and accepted the terms and conditions.
